description: For each voxel in the output dataset, computes the fraction of it that is occupied by nonzero voxels from the input.

template.title: Template Dataset
template.description: Use dataset as a template for the output. The output dataset will be on the same grid as this dataset.

input.title: Input Dataset
input.description: Use dataset for the input. Only the sub-brick #0 of the input is used.

clip.title: Clip Fraction
clip.description: Clip off voxels that are less than the specified occupancy fraction.

warp.title: Warp Dataset
warp.description: Dataset that provides a transformation (warp) from +orig coordinates to the coordinates of the input dataset.

preserve.title: Preserve Nonzero Values Flag
preserve.description: Preserve the nonzero values of input voxels in the output dataset rather than creating a fractional mask.

vote.title: Vote for Preservation Flag
vote.description: Vote for which input value to preserve when using the preserve flag.
